details: Implement new frontend experiences and functionalities for the AWS IAM Identity Center console and AWS Access Portal
Develop enhancements in the infrastructure, automated tests, and monitoring for frontend applications
Write technical design documents for new features and perform code reviews
Develop new features for various mobile and Web applications using AngularJS, Angular, VueJS, Cordova, Ionic, and Electron
Write technical documentation and perform code reviews
Oversee the design and development of a video-driven recruitment and seat-leasing platform built with VueJS and Django
Collaborate on the implementation of the video tournament platform backend using Django framework
Implement the core reusable JavaScript modules for the channelfix.com video tournament platform
Lead the frontend migration efforts into VueJS in order to modernize the technology stack
Write technical documentation and perform code reviews
Teach lectures for a Web Engineering class
Handle laboratory classes about Web Engineering and Data Structures
Help to build the frontend for the Codetoki learn-to-code platform using Haml, Sass, and CoffeeScript
Develop the frontend for the Foodtoki project, a local restaurant discovery website
